All rooms w/ views facing south of the lake, the park, and the Ferris wheel! This home is in mint condition w/ hardwood floors in foyer, LR, DR & kitchen. Carpet in dressing area & master bedroom. Crisp white cabinetry grounded by granite countertops/ back splash. Kitchen island has storage and room for casual dining. French doors lead to LR/DR. Elegant gas fireplace is focal point in LR. Powder Room & Huge master bath w/ steeping tub, separate shower, double sinks all clad in soothing crema marfil stone. Tons of storage, gracious floorplan and a 6X12 terrace w/ gas & electricity. Terrace is set back & surrounded by structure for almost year round use! Pkg.#7 & wine storage included in price. #302 is a real gem among much larger, more $$$ homes in 840.
